publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-754 Bill Kidd: Scotto Lotto—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of "Scotto!", the first Scotland-only lottery which will be launched this November in conjunction with a new STV quiz programme, Postcode Challenge, aimed at raising the profile of Scottish charities; notes that similar people’s postcode lotteries have been running in the Netherlands and Sweden for the past 17 years and have raised over £2 billion and that "Scotto!" aims to raise over £100,000 pounds per week for charity after its first year, and wishes it every success in its aims of enhancing community spirit, creating thousands of local winners and supporting Scottish charities.
